Code: EXEC SQL SELECT IMP_SEGURADA_IX, PRM_TARIFARIO_IX, cod_opcao, vlprmtot, pciocc FROM seguros.v1bilhete_cober WHERE cod_empresa = :COD_EMPRESA AND ramofr = :RAMOFR AND modalifr = :MODALIFR AND vlprmtot = :VLPRMTOT AND dtinivig <= :DTINIVIG AND dttervig >= :DTINIVIG AND ide_cobertura = '1' END SQL
